name: Sir Fleur
description:
Sir Fleur is a combat based platformer. Seeking a bounty of some sweet honey, Sir Fleur must save the bee queen  from the clutches of the malicious slimes. Throughout the games 20 levels, you'll complete a wide variety of battles and even an action packed boss chase.

Controls

  • → : move right
  • ← : move left
  • z : jump, select
  • x : attack (repeat this keystroke with correct timing to combo)
  • esc : pause
  • ↑ : cursor up
  • ↓ : cursor down
  • r : restart level (in case of a soft lock)
